dcterms:title: Casa Loma
dcterms:creator: Sir Henry Pellatt (commissioner)
dcterms:subject: Gothic Revival Architecture; Toronto Landmark; Filming Location
dcterms:description: Gothic Revival mansion in Toronto, Canada (1 Austin Terrace, M5R 1X8). Built 1911-1914 as private residence for financier Sir Henry Pellatt. Now public museum. Featured in Scott Pilgrim vs. the World screenplay (SCPT) as the 'totally awesome castle' for Lucas Lee battle scene.
dcterms:isPartOf: Toronto Historic Sites; Scott Pilgrim universe
